author: costin
msg: Get rid of WEB-INF and a lot of stuff that is no longer needed.
We should also get rid of most tomcat deps - the only one that's
needed is to build the ajp package for tomcat4, but that shouldn't
require all the detection ( and should be called by tomcat4 build files

author: costin
msg: Remove interceptors - coyote mechanism is used as connector

author: costin
msg: Removed the web.xml-based config - coyote is used instead.
